Body: This has been happening for many days. Some applications are getting installed without my permission, even though I've disabled the 'Unknown Sources' option in Security Settings. Also, I've installed Application Install Blocker and other applications can't be installed, but apps named Timeservice, Data and others get installed.
Title: Apps such as Timeservice are getting automatically installed but Unknown sources option is disabled already

history.Text: This is happening from many days. Some Applications are installed without my permission, Through I disabled the 'Unknown Source' from Security Setting. And also I installed Application Install Blocker, and other application can't install.But why the application is Silently install in my phone (E:g: TimeService, Data, and More.Please Help Me?
App. installed without my permission, what I do?
